00022 #define HYPERTABLE_NOTIFIER_H

00024 #include <cstdio>

00030 #include "Common/ReferenceCount.h"
00031

00033 namespace Hypertable {
00037   class Notifier : public ReferenceCount {
00038   public:
00039     Notifier(const char *addr_str) {
00040       DispatchHandlerPtr null_handler(0);
00041       m_comm = Comm::instance();
00042       if (!InetAddr::initialize(&m_addr, addr_str)) {
00043         exit(1);
00044       }
00045       InetAddr::initialize(&m_send_addr, INADDR_ANY, 0);
00046       m_comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&m_send_addr, 0x10, null_handler);
00047     }
00048 
00049     Notifier() : m_comm(0) {
00050       return;
00051     }
00052 
00053     void notify() {
00054       if (m_comm) {
00055         int error;
00056         CommHeader header(0);
00057         CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(header, 0));
00058         if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_addr, m_send_addr, cbp))
00059             != Error::OK) {
00060           HT_ERRORF("Problem sending datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00061           exit(1);
00062         }
00063       }
00064     }
00065 
00066   private:
00067     Comm *m_comm;
00068     struct sockaddr_in m_addr;
00069     struct sockaddr_in m_send_addr;
00070   };// class Hypertable::Notifier
00071   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<Notifier> NotifierPtr;
00072 
00073 } // namepace Hypertable
00074 #endif // HYPERTABLE_NOTIFIER_H
